metadata.title: CVE-2022-48778 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:mtd: rawnand: gpmi: don't leak PM reference in error pathIf gpmi_nfc_apply_timings() fails, the PM runtime usage counter must bedropped.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
